statements: SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 1001;

SELECT loan_id, SUM(amount) FROM Loans GROUP BY loan_id;
SELECT approval_status, COUNT(*) FROM Loans GROUP BY approval_status;
SELECT loan_id FROM Loans WHERE approval_status NOT IN ('rejected', 'cancelled');

SELECT Loans.id, Loans.amount, Loans.interest_rate, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id

SELECT Applications.application_id, Applications.application_date, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, Loans.amount FROM Applications JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Loans ON Applications.loan_id = Loans.id WHERE Loans.amount > 5000

SELECT Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, COUNT(Applications.customer_id) AS num_applications FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Applications ON Customers.customer_id = Applications.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY customer_id

SELECT Loans.id, Loans.amount, Loans.interest_rate, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id ORDER BY Loans.amount DESC

SELECT Applications.application_id, Applications.application_date, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, Loans.amount FROM Applications JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Loans ON Applications.loan_id = Loans.id WHERE Loans.amount > 5000 ORDER BY Loans.amount ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Applications WHERE loan_id IN (SELECT id FROM Loans WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED'))

SELECT Loans.id, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY Loans.id

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, SUM(amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM Customers JOIN Applications ON Customers.customer_id = Applications.customer_id JOIN Loans ON Applications.loan_id = Loans.id WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY customer_id

SELECT Loans.id, Loans.amount, Loans.interest_rate, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Loans.approval_status = 'APPROVED'

SELECT Applications.application_id, Applications.application_date, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, Loans.amount FROM Applications JOIN Customers ON Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Loans ON Applications.loan_id = Loans.id WHERE Loans.amount > 5000 AND Loans.approval_status = 'APPROVED'

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Applications WHERE loan_id IN (SELECT id FROM Loans WHERE approval_status = 'APPROVED')) ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Applications)

SELECT Loans.id, Loans.amount, Loans.interest_rate, Applications.application_date FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id WHERE Applications.application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT Loans.id, Loans.amount, Loans.interest_rate, Applications.application_date FROM Loans JOIN Applications ON Loans.id = Applications.loan_id WHERE Applications.application_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS num_customers FROM Applications
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Applications WHERE Applications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id)
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM Loans GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_loan_amount > 10000

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Loans.loan_amount, Payments.payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.loan_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR' OR employee_department = 'Finance';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, payment_date FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id WHERE payment_amount >= 5000;
SELECT loan_id, interest_rate, approval_status FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount >= 5000 AND interest_rate <= 3.0;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%' AND employee_position LIKE '%Manager%';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, payment_date FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_position != 'Intern';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Loans ON Customers.customer_id = Loans.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id WHERE payment_amount <= 1000;

SELECT lender_id, count(application_id) as num_applications FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY lender_id;
SELECT lender_id, sum(amount) as total_loan_amount FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY lender_id;
SELECT payment_date, sum(amount) as total_payments FROM Payments GROUP BY payment_date;
SELECT borrower_id, count(application_id) as num_applications FROM LoanApplications WHERE status='Processing' GROUP BY borrower_id;

SELECT company_name, sum(amount) as total_loans_approved FROM Lenders INNER JOIN LoanApplications ON Lenders.lender_id = LoanApplications.lender_id WHERE LoanApplications.status='Approved' GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT loan_id, sum(amount) as total_payments_received FROM Payments GROUP BY loan_id;
SELECT lender_id, avg(amount) as avg_loan_amount FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY lender_id;

SELECT * FROM Lenders L INNER JOIN LoanApplications LA ON L.lender_id = LA.lender_id
SELECT loan_id, amount, payment_date FROM Loans L LEFT JOIN Payments P ON L.loan_id = P.loan_id
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, application_date FROM Borrowers B JOIN LoanApplications LA ON B.borrower_id = LA.borrower_id
SELECT lender_id, company_name, location, website, status FROM Lenders L JOIN LoanApplications LA ON L.lender_id = LA.lender_id WHERE status = 'approved'
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM Loans L JOIN Payments P ON L.loan_id = P.loan_id WHERE L.amount > 5000
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Loans
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM Loans
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM Loans WHERE approval_status = 'approved'
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(application_id) AS application_count FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY borrower_id
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS application_count FROM Lenders L JOIN LoanApplications LA ON L.lender_id = LA.lender_id GROUP BY location
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 20000
SELECT loan_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM Loans
SELECT company_name, MIN(interest_rate) AS min_interest_rate FROM Lenders L JOIN LoanApplications LA ON L.lender_id = LA.lender_id
